item.title: Samizdat (Down with Big Tech)
item.description: Self/DIY The word самиздат roughly translates to self- or DIY publishing. Сам (sam) means self, издатель means publisher. If you search for the term, you’ll often come across services offering self-publishing and self-funded book publishing. Вас могут читать уже сегодня!
